Reviews.Title: glitchy dvr
Reviews.Author: K. merrill "mechman76"
Reviews.Content: The cameras are fine for the price but he DVR is glitchy when your trying to find and view recordings.It's very slow and freezes up when replaying.

Reviews.Title: Good product. Bad Instructions.
Reviews.Author: Frank B.
Reviews.Content: If only they could explain how to program the system and get the internet app working right it would have gotten 5 stars. Pictures are high quality. Instructions are terrible.

Reviews.Title: Better than advertised
Reviews.Author: JJKaz
Reviews.Content: Order came quickly....well packaged.  After installation, I found these cameras better than anticipated.  The range andClarity ARE Better than described. I utilize the system for inside office use.  (tenants now lock doors and the fun andGames have stopped).  The iPhone feature is very clear and I can look into my property 24-7.The price is great. installation is easy.  Thanks Zmodo....and thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Nie
Reviews.Content: It came late but other than that it works perfect And its as clear as day when used at night
